name: A Flare Away
description:
The year is 2050 a solar flare will be striking the earth and singeing all life upon it. You have been tasked with creating a successful civilization. You will see 40 possible candidates and you must determine if they are good or bad and whether to let them onto the new planet.

Credits: (TREPOHQ TEAM)

Connor - Lead Programmer and Music. Discord: xandify#9961

We had 2 weeks to work on this but only used the last week or so. We procrastinated during the first week, all we did during that time was planning it out. In the second week, our game designers’ computers broke, and our artist had a mental breakdown.
